author: Mars
text: Softly, slowly but growing. So when you feel like this do all that you feel you need to go through this moment, stay strong you are not alone I am with you ♥️

author: Mars
text:
There are times that we see being stuck in a place, feeling like falling apart or making mistakes as something wrong. 
That's not true, you are not stuck, you are not falling apart, the mistakes you are making aren't wrong. What you are doing is Growing

author: Mars
text:
NEVER let your own fear stop you from achieving what you really want.
Your goals, your dreams are out there waiting for you to take them, don't let that chance get out of your reach

author: Mars
text:
There are times that you will ask yourself if it was worth it.
But if it give you not only the life you want but also the life you want for the person you really love then it was.

author: Mars
text:
"no matter how long it will take you will make it.
You will be what you want to be, 
It depends only on you to be happy.
Found happiness inside of you and not from others."
